title: Minor Caitlyn Bug?
body:
So preseason is here went to try a few champs so far. Found maybe a minor bug but when Caitlyn has her headshot ready and is shooting at an enemy tower the damage sometimes isn't displayed.

OH! 1 more thing...why is Phantom Dancer disabled? I didn't see any announcement or notification.

replies.body: Caitlyn Headshot cannot proc on structures. Its intended and not a bug.
I know that I'm saying the dmg isn't displayed when hitting it. Please re-read
The damage cannot be displayed, as there is no damage to display
Well what I'm saying is can it still be displayed normally even though she has her headshot ready.
It literally has no effect. Headshot does not deal damage to towers. Sure, if she attacks a champion it'll deal extra damage. But you can't really headshot a tower can you
